events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate who is interested in the software engineer position and is eager to contribute to our development projects.
The candidate's resume and cover letter have been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department due to significant experience in software development and devops.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's application and coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
Initial screening call went well, with the candidate demonstrating deep knowledge in software engineering principles and enthusiasm for the role.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback, confirming their availability for further technical interviews.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next Monday to evaluate the candidate's coding skills and problem-solving approaches.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong expertise in software development and suitable devops knowledge.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidateâ€™s expectations, team fit, and company culture alignment.
HR interview was completed successfully; the candidate shared their career goals and expressed a strong interest in joining the company.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and role responsibilities tailored to their experience and expertise.
The candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed enthusiasm to review and finalize the employment terms.
Candidate officially accepted the job offer, confirming their intention to join the company as a software engineer on the agreed start date.
The onboarding process has commenced, including access to necessary tools, documents, and introductory meetings with the engineering team.
The hiring process is now closed with the candidate successfully integrated and actively contributing as a software engineer on our projects.
